content: both english and japanese versions are fully charted using standard knitting and/or crochet symbols for help using japanese charted patterns please visit the japanese knitting & crochet group 1 **japanese version available here 2 ** **materials ** * japanese size 7/0 crochet hook 4 0mm * 6g 10m color a * 4g 6 7m color b no gauge is given 1 http //www ravelry com/groups/japanese-knitting-and-crochet 2 https //item rakuten co jp/gosyo/27-28-37/
